Posts.Content: Jul 6, 2011 03:45PM lmk wrote: ...Â Adjuvant therapy is given to prevent or delay these cells from multiplying and spreading. The purpose of adjuvant therapy with ARIMIDEX is to help to delay the breast cancer from recurring. Cytotoxic chemotherapy, radiation, and hormonal treatment are three common forms of adjuvant treatment.
Posts.Title: Adjvnt Therapy: Destroys or delays growth of stray BC cells? SusansGarden Omaz
